Corpus: The CLASSLA-StanfordNLP model for named entity recognition of standard Bulgarian 1.0
Description: This model for named entity recognition of standard Bulgarian was built with the CLASSLA-StanfordNLP tool by training on the BulTreeBank training corpus and using the CoNLL2017 word embeddings.#SEPThe model is available for download from the CLARIN.SI repository.

Corpus: The CLASSLA-StanfordNLP model for named entity recognition of standard Croatian 1.0
Description: This model for named entity recognition of standard Croatian was built with the CLASSLA-StanfordNLP tool by training on the hr500k training corpus and using the CLARIN.SI-embed.hr word embeddings.#SEPThe model is available for download from the CLARIN.SI repository.

Corpus: The CLASSLA-StanfordNLP model for named entity recognition of non-standard Croatian 1.0
Description: This model for named entity recognition of non-standard Croatian was built with the CLASSLA-StanfordNLP tool by training on the hr500k training corpus, the ReLDI-NormTagNER-hr corpus and the ReLDI-NormTagNER-sr corpus, using the CLARIN.SI-embed.hr word embeddings . The training corpora were additionally augmented for handling missing diacritics by repeating parts of the corpora with diacritics removed.#SEPThe model is available for download from the CLARIN.SI repository.
These are models for the named entity recognizer NameTag.#SEPThe models are available for download from the LINDAT repository.

These models are for NameTag 2, a named entity recognition tool (see also the Named Entity Recognizers Resource Family). The documentation is available separately on the project webpage.#SEPThe models are available for download from the LINDAT repository.

This is an English model for NameTag, a named entity recognition tool. The model is trained on CoNLL-2003 training data and recognizes PER, ORG, LOC and MISC named entities. It achieves an F-measure 84.73 on the CoNLL-2003 test data.#SEPThe model is available for download from the LINDAT repository.
This is a model for the Liner 2.5 tool. #SEPThe model is available for download from the CLARIN-PL repository.

This is a Liner2 model for the recognition of named entities. The model was trained on the NKJP corpus and evaluated in the PolEval 2018 Task 2.#SEPThe model is available for download from the CLARIN-PL repository.

Corpus: The CLASSLA-StanfordNLP model for named entity recognition of standard Serbian 1.0
Description: This model for named entity recognition of standard Serbian was built with the CLASSLA-StanfordNLP tool by training on the SETimes.SR training corpus and using the CLARIN.SI-embed.sr word embeddings.#SEPThe model is available for download from the CLARIN.SI repository.

Corpus: The CLASSLA-StanfordNLP model for named entity recognition of non-standard Serbian 1.0
Description: This model for named entity recognition of non-standard Serbian was built with the CLASSLA-StanfordNLP tool by training on the SETimes.SR training corpus/a>, the hr500k training corpus, the ReLDI-NormTagNER-sr corpus, and the ReLDI-NormTagNER-hr corpus, using the CLARIN.SI-embed.sr word embeddings. The training corpora were additionally augmented for handling missing diacritics by repeating parts of the corpora with diacritics removed.#SEPThe model is available for download from the CLARIN.SI repository.

Corpus: The CLASSLA-StanfordNLP model for named entity recognition of standard Slovenian 1.0
Description: This model for named entity recognition of standard Slovenian was built with the CLASSLA-StanfordNLP tool by training on the ssj500k training corpus and using the CLARIN.SI-embed.sl word embeddings.#SEPThe model is available for download from the CLARIN.SI repository.

Corpus: The CLASSLA-StanfordNLP model for named entity recognition of non-standard Slovenian 1.0
Description: This model for named entity recognition of non-standard Slovenian was built with the CLASSLA-StanfordNLP tool by training on the ssj500k training corpus and the Janes-Tag training corpus, using the CLARIN.SI-embed.sl word embeddings. The training corpora were additionally augmented for handling missing diacritics by repeating parts of the corpora with diacritics removed.#SEPThe model is available for download from the CLARIN.SI repository.

Corpus: PyTorch model for Slovenian Named Entity Recognition SloNER 1.0
Description: This is a model for Slovenian Named Entity Recognition. It is is a PyTorch neural network model, intended for usage with the HuggingFace transformers library .#SEPThe model is based on the Slovenian RoBERTa contextual embeddings model SloBERTa 2.0. The model was trained on the SUK 1.0 training corpus.The source code of the model is available on GitHub repository.#SEPThe model is available for download from the CLARIN.SI repository.
